p: LF is the naturally occurring compound mostly differing from the others. Clinical trials are designed to evaluate the local treatment of nasal mucosa with LF by using a spray formulation. The rationale of the implication of LF for COVID-19 prevention has the following fundaments: reverting the iron disorders due to the viral colonization, modulating the immune response or down-regulating the pro-inflammatory cytokines released by the viral inflammation [ 67].
